attributes.action: To increase the number of awareness adverts opposed to the majority being advertising
attributes.additional_details: To see more awareness adverts in the media opposed to advertising. I recently saw The Chokeables advert by St John Ambulance: save a choking child and realised we need more adverts like this. They are purely there to offer help and advice to the nation and not to advertise. We need more adverts like this on a variety of subjects from educational tips to sport tips.

rejection.details: This is a matter for the individual charity or organisation to arrange with the media companies.
